Eco Tips

Learn sustainable living tips

💡 Quick Tip: Energy Saving
Unplug electronics when not in use. Even in standby mode, devices consume energy. This simple habit can reduce your electricity bill by 5-10%.
🚿 Water Conservation
Take shorter showers! Reducing your shower time by just 2 minutes can save up to 1,500 gallons of water per year.
🍽️ Food Waste Prevention
Plan your meals ahead and store food properly. About 30% of food is wasted globally - you can make a difference!
♻️ Smart Recycling
Clean containers before recycling. Contaminated recyclables often end up in landfills instead of being processed.
🌱 Green Transportation
Combine trips and errands. Planning efficient routes can reduce your carbon footprint and save time and money.
